name: Destination Sol
tagline: Welcome to the Destination Sol open source arcade space shooter. Pew pew!
body:
### Welcome to Destination Sol

This is a placeholder version for our GitHub Page splash site, with the goal being a similar site as http://terasology.org hosted at https://github.com/MovingBlocks/movingblocks.github.com

Destination Sol is a space arcade shooter that we (the MovingBlocks open source organization) adopted in early 2015.

For more visit the following sites:

* Source: https://github.com/MovingBlocks/DestinationSol
* Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/342980
* Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.miloshpetrov.sol2.android&hl=en

### Running Destination Sol from source

Requires Java 7 or 8. Can either use Git or download a source zip from GitHub (link above)

```
$ git clone https://github.com/MovingBlocks/DestinationSol.git
$ cd DestinationSol
$ gradlew run
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
